artist: Designer: Henry Mercer; Manufacturer: Moravian Pottery & Tile Works
creditline: Gift of Christopher Monkhouse in honor of Myron and Anita Kunin
description: moulded decoration of tower and swan in center, surrounded by Latin Biblical inscription; blue, cream and rust glazes
inscription: \"There is a river, the streams whereof shall make glad the city of God\", moulded, in Latin, on front
title: "Tower and swan" tile
